meta.description: Determine the number of ship and plane trips to minimize fuel consumption while meeting container transport and trip constraints.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Modes of transportation available for goods.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Container capacity for each mode of transport.

params.name: fuel_usage
params.description: Fuel usage per trip for each mode of transport.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each mode of transport.

objective.name: min_total_fuel
objective.expr: sum(fuel_usage[mode] * trips[mode] for mode in TRANSPORT_MODES)
objective.description: Minimize the total fuel consumption for all trips.

constraints.name: min_containers
constraints.description: Ensure at least 500 containers are transported.

constraints.name: max_plane_trips
constraints.description: Limit the number of plane trips to at most 10.

constraints.name: min_ship_trip_ratio
constraints.description: At least 50% of the trips must be made by ship.
